page.title: 16Trade
page.content: The village of {Tintagel} is very busy in the summer but many shops close in winter.Of the 35 shops in the village only 5 are food shops.One of these is a butcher's shop.The rest of them sell all kinds of food and are supermarket type shops.Most of the other shops cater for the tourist trade.They sell souvenirs including pottery,leather_ ware,glass,postcards and books.The most sold book is the Castle Guide Book.Other premises trading in the village are concerned with food and drink.There are 3 public houses,9 licensed restaurants,3 cafes and snack bars and 3 take_aways.There are 3 banks,2 building societies,a post office and 3 garages. In the summer there is a weekly market selling clothes,fruit,china,rugs,shoes and linen.
